trends: There has been one other sighting in Mineral Wells
There were no other sightings in Mineral Wells on or around June 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving from mineral well, tx to graham, tx. Over a 45 min period. To glowing objects. Top object was horizontal jet stream shake which turned into a ball. The bottom object started out as a double horizontal jet stream shape with an upside down horseshoe disk underneath which changed into a parachute shape with a darn I next hanging under the parachute shape. Then Changed into a ball. Both keep a parallel flight path which seemed very slow at first but then gradually getting faster.
Summary: Glowing white change shape from horizontal jet stream to vertical jet stream with horseshoe disk under neath then into a ball form
